elements.text: Does anyone know how much Decimal charge for the Cricket feed?

attachments.fallback: [July 1st, 2024 7:24 AM] liam: Does anyone know how much Decimal charge for the Cricket feed?
attachments.text: Does anyone know how much Decimal charge for the Cricket feed?

text: <@U4H19D1D2> I cannot unfortunately, could you please send a screenshot of that conversation?

elements.text: I cannot unfortunately, could you please send a screenshot of that conversation?
Weird as it lets me search it but then the link doesn't work
Does anyone know how much Decimal charge for the Cricket feed?
I'm on the hunt for a decent feed too!
Is it just a score feed? Is Betfair's not up to scratch?
I have sent an email, will share the price if they do however I fear it might be out of my budget
I can give you a personal introduction if you don’t get anywhere
I think the main issue, not just for cricket, is Betfair's inability to use the widely accepted team or players names.
And the inability to match names strikes again
It's a complete fucking joke tbh, almost 3 years this has been in 'production'
you would have thought, it being the same team causing the issue as yesterday, they might have pre-empted it .....
The usual ongoing mapping issues and there is some sort of bug with the Lancashire game which is pushing out about a million updates per second on certain connections, seems like they just don't care
Wow, looks like this is bringing down my entire scraping infrastructure
Try restarting, doesn’t seem to be on every connection
Better but the damage has already been done
nice to know the cricket feed could take down all my recording
Well your mileage may vary depending on how much disk space your box has and whether you have appropriate alerts set up
Is this a recent problem or  long term? Just wondering if it's related to my recent server reboot as I am recording the cricket score feed on said server.
Recent, started today at 11:45ish, apparently now fixed
Looks like either it was never fixed or it started happening again today at about 1am
This file is hidden because it was uploaded more than 90 days ago.
My machine must have been smoking, I wonder what's going on... (edited)
Any ball park price numbers come back?
You are more than welcome to come direct but we do have a minimum fee for direct customers that may be prohibitive to you of £2k per month and £150 per game.
2K a month AND £150 a game. No idea if that's cheap or expensive to be fair
Expensive compared to other sports but there’s easily enough liquidity in a match to extract that much EV
I read that as £150 a game, minimum 2k a month.
Update on the betfair feed is that I have continued hounding Neil to the point they have made some changes to the 'team' lots of politics/stupid code freezes but things have improved
I noticed last month there was a big jump in quantity of matches with the feed. Up around 100 matches.
Is that seasonal or from the improvements?
Both but we are now down to missing about 15% of the matches due to mapping, there where times last year where it was around 50%
How do you work out which markets are missing the feed?
nightly script to reconcile between market/feed data
are we expecting every cricket match to have the feed?
pretty much, expect sub ~3% to not have a feed depending on what betfair put up
Has anyone levelled up to big stakes from the feed?
I am up to a few k exposure per market
Nice. Model or mix of price and flow? I struggled to avoid averse selection when testing it.
how do you know Decimal is the best data provider in the cricket space? Something you've been able to test? (edited)
I don't, its just the one betfair provide
I can say that the people behind it have been involved in cricket data for at least a decade
Another option is sportmonks - they look pretty decent too
Has the Betfair cricket feed not improved ?
Yes it has but it’s been hard work (for myself and Neil)
